group_1.textRight: *Pant*...*Pant*...Shigure, are you okay...?

group_1.textLeft: ...You're the one who doesn't look okay...

group_1.textRight: Sorry...out of breath...*Pant*@...had to run...a lot...

group_1.textLeft: I'm really sorry, even though you explained@it all to me yesterday...
About how we shouldn't stand still, and that@we should choose to move forward...
I still lost my temper anyway...

group_1.textRight: No, I understand how you feel, Shigure...

group_1.textLeft: What do we do... This might have been our@only chance...
The instructor said that if we don't trust that girl,@then...

group_1.textRight: Like the instructor said, the first thing we need@to do is get to know her.
Shigure, do you remember?
When we first met at Hotel Fendt Hope...
Hi, there... Good work today...
So, umm... I was wondering if we could chat@for a bit?
I mean, I'm not saying you have to, but@I'd just like to get to know you better...
Um, I'm really sorry...@I don't mean to be pushy...
At first, you wouldn't speak to me at all...
But... Then we fought a Witch together, and we@realized that we were both Black Feathers.
So, um... If it's okay with you,@I'd like to be friends...!
Since we're both Black Feathers...@I think this is meant to be...!

group_1.textLeft: I also...kinda...wanted to@talk to you, too...

group_1.textRight: We became close friends.
That's why I'm sure you and Himena just need@some kind of opportunity, too...

group_1.textLeft: ...You're the only one who understands me,@Hagumun...
And, well, you're like a big sister to me...

group_1.textRight: [chara:103001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Big sister?! [chara:103001:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:103001:cheek_1][chara:103001:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:103001:lipSynch_1]R-r-really...ehehe...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... Even though I'm not a pleasant person@to be around, you always stick with me...

group_1.textRight: I like you too, Shigure. You're always so@straight to the point.

group_1.textLeft: I won't run away from that girl, I'll face her.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, let's do it!
Speaking of Himena, that's her now. It sounds@like she wants to talk to you, too.
